Together, we can keep pushing for sensible policies that{" "} prioritize the safety and emotional health of our students .

Your support also helps us offer services that fulfill our school mission of providing social-emotional wellness, advancing our{" "} anti-bias/anti-racist curriculum, and sustaining a student-to-teacher ratio that ensures{" "} every child receives the attention and care they deserve .

PTA funds go towards:

Your donation is fully tax deductible; the Neighborhood School PTA is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization. Donations big and small allow TNS to continue our incredible mission and create a safe and nurturing environment for our children. content.content:
1→"use client"
     2→
     3→import * as React from "react"
     4→import { useRouter } from "next/navigation"
     5→
     6→import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
     7→import { ButtonProps, buttonVariants } from "@/components/ui/button"
     8→import { toast } from "@/components/ui/use-toast"
     9→import { Icons } from "./ui/icons"
    10→
    11→interface FormCreateButtonProps extends ButtonProps {}
    12→
    13→export function FormCreateButton({
    14→  className,
    15→  variant,
    16→  ...props
    17→}: FormCreateButtonProps) {
    18→  const router = useRouter()
    19→  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = React.useState<boolean>(false)
    20→
    21→  async function onClick() {
    22→    setIsLoading(true)
    23→
    24→    const response = await fetch("/api/forms", {
    25→      method: "POST",
    26→      headers: {
    27→        "Content-Type": "application/json",
    28→      },
    29→      body: JSON.stringify({
    30→        title: "Untitled Form",
    31→      }),
    32→    })
    33→
    34→    setIsLoading(false)
    35→
    36→    if (!response?.ok) {
    37→      if (response.status === 402) {
    38→        return toast({
    39→          title: "Unauthorized action.",
    40→          description: "Something bad happened, sorry!",
    41→          variant: "destructive",
    42→        })
    43→      }
    44→
    45→      return toast({
    46→        title: "Something went wrong.",
    47→        description: "Your form was not created. Please try again.",
    48→        variant: "destructive",
    49→      })
    50→    }
    51→
    52→    const form = await response.json()
    53→
    54→    // This forces a cache invalidation.
    55→    router.refresh()
    56→
    57→    router.push(`/editor/${form.id}`)
    58→  }
    59→
    60→  return (
    61→    <button
    62→      onClick={onClick}
    63→      className={cn(
    64→        buttonVariants({ variant }),
    65→        {
    66→          "cursor-not-allowed opacity-60": isLoading,
    67→        },
    68→        className
    69→      )}
    70→      disabled={isLoading}
